commands.name: dev
commands.prompt: Run `pnpm dev` to start the development server. This will start Next.js on http://localhost:3000 with hot reloading enabled.

commands.name: test
commands.prompt: Run `pnpm test` to execute the Jest test suite. For watch mode, use `pnpm test:watch`. For coverage report, use `pnpm test:coverage`.

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Run ESLint to check code quality
commands.prompt: Run `pnpm lint` to check for linting errors and code quality issues.

commands.name: build
commands.prompt: Run `pnpm build` to create an optimized production build of the Next.js application.

commands.name: test-e2b
commands.prompt: Run `pnpm test:e2b` to test the E2B code interpreter integration and sandbox functionality.
